channel.title: Testers Wanted for upcoming Whonix 8.1 Maintenance release
channel.description:
[html]

Download link for Virtual Box images (.ova), experimental .qcow images and OpenPGP signatures (.asc):

https://sourceforge.net/projects/whonixdevelopermetafiles/files/8.1/

Please test so this can soon become the new stable release.

Changelog: – updated Debian packages – fixed Tor restart bug when updated by apt-get

[/html]

item.title: Testers Wanted for upcoming Whonix 8.1 Maintenance release
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
8.1 workstation and gateway build fine.

Read full topic
